concept.title: Control the Hatching in Islands
concept.shortdesc: You can specify methods of hatching objects in outermost boundary as normal, outer and ignore. Normal is the default hatch pattern, besides, you can view hatching results of different types in the Islands area on Hatch tab of the Hatch and Gradient dialog box.

conbody.p: Hatch the pattern fromthe outer boundary to inside. Hatching process will be stopped when encountering inner crossing points and continue hatching until second inner crossing point appears. So if counter from the outer boundary of hatch area, the area separated by odd number crossing points will be hatched, on contrary the area separated by even crossing points will not be hatched.

Hatch the pattern fromthe outer boundary to inside. For the hatching starts fromtwo points of each hatch line, the system will hatch from the outer most layer of configuration, and keep the internal blank. Hatching process will be stopped when encountering inner crossing points.
